name: No Longer Epcot Music Quiz / Test | Coasters & Theme Parks | 10 Questions

questions.text: There were two theme songs for the Universe of Energy. One was "Universe of Energy". What was the other one?
questions.correct: Energy (You Make The World Go Round)
questions.explanation:
Energy (You Make The World Go Round).

	An interesting, and well produced, documentary on energy has been replaced by "Ellen's Energy Adventure." Another example of the "dumming down" of education in our society.

questions.text: What was the theme song to "The Land Boat Ride"?
questions.explanation:
Listen to the Land.

	"Living with the Land" is what it is now called. Same exact ride minus the song. Go figure? "Symbiosis" was a great movie at The Land Pavilion that is now gone, along with the charming "Kitchen Kabaret" which featured the hilarious "Veggie, Veggie, Fruit, Fruit."

questions.text: Now that the Dreamfinder is gone from "Journey Into Imagination", there is no one to sing which song?
questions.explanation:
One Little Spark.

	Kids everywhere should declare a year of mourning. This was one of the most charming attractions at Epcot for little kids. "Magic Journeys" was from the first of Disney's new amazing 3-D films that started at Epcot, moved to the Magic Kingdom, and has now gone the way of all the rest.

questions.text: "Spaceship Earth" has been totally revamped. Well, by revamped I mean they just got rid of the song. What was it?
options: If We Can Dream It, We Can Do It

questions.text: Now that one of the best attractions in Epcot, "Horizons", is gone, so is this song.
options: There's a Great Big Beautiful Tomorrow
questions.explanation:
New Horizons.

	"Beautiful Tomorrow" and "Now Is the Time" are from "The Carousel of Progress", one of Walt Disney's earliest attractions and, I'm sure, the next to go.

questions.text: One of the first songs to go was "The Computer Song" from an attraction called "Astuter Computer Review". Where was this attraction found?
questions.explanation:
Communicore.

	Innoventions replaced Communicore. This is one example of where the powers that be were correct in their thinking. Communicore was starting to look dated and Innoventions is closer to what Disney intended the spirit of Epcot to be.

questions.text: Now that Kodak no longer sponsers the 3-D films in Future World, which song has been 86-ed.
Only one musical number at Epcot has had its original music added to, rather than removed. What is it?
questions.correct: Golden Dreams from The American Adventure
options: It's Fun To Be Free from World of Motion
Makin' Memories from Journey Into Imagination
questions.explanation:
Golden Dreams from The American Adventure.

	Another verse and extra footage have been added.

questions.text: The song "Canada" from the Canada Pavillion in World Showcase is still there, but is the next song slated to go. What is the second title for this song?
options: Lifeline of Wonder on Planet Earth
questions.explanation:
You're a Lifetime Journey.

	I love this song, Say good-bye to it. (Why do I feel like the Germans have marched into France?)

questions.text: What is the only song that mentions the area "Future World" in its lyrics?
questions.explanation:
Tomorrow's Child.

	The chorus goes "Tomorrow's child, sharing a brand new day. For the future world is born today."
